Description:
Henley Built Family Home in Prime a Location ....!!!!
Universal Real Estate Vic proudly presents this beautiful home that could be an end to your exploration for a perfect home for your family. This home has a blend of practicality and class. Ideally located in one of the Craigieburn's most Popular Estate and Well equipped with all the bells and whistles to impress first home buyers or even the savviest of Investors.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 3 Spacious Bedrooms (Massive Master Bedroom with Walk-in Robe and Full Ensuite, other 2 bedrooms with BIR and serviced by a central bathroom).- BATHROOMS: Central Bathroom with extra-large bathtub and stone benchtops. Master Bed Bathroom with Double vanity and stone benchtops.
- KITCHEN: Spacious Open Plan Living/ Dining Kitchen with 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances, 40mm stone benchtops, Electric Oven, Double Fridge Space, Walk-in Pantry, Dishwasher, Soft close Cupboards and pot drawers.
- LIVING AREA: Open Plan Living /Dining/Kitchen
- LAUNDRY: Spacious Laundry with direct access to backyard & Covered Outdoor Living
- PARKING: Double Car Garage with remote control access and direct internal access.
- BACKYARD: Low Maintenance Backyard with Concrete around the house.
- ALFRESCO: Covered alfresco with decking and sliding glass screen doors.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Wide Entry, Downlights, Quality laminated floorboards, High-Quality Carpet, Fly Screens, Palmate with Blinds, Chandeliers, Ceiling Fans, Linen Cupboards and Additional Pergola at back.
- LOCATION: With all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre, Aitken Creek Primary School(900m), Newbury Primary School(900), Mount Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, Local Shops (800m), Public Transport, Bus Stop and Child Care Facilities.
If you're in the market for that perfect all-round property, then look no further than this.
Don't miss out! Call Robbie Sandhu-0466 074 580 or Achal Arora - 0432 413 929.
SALE METHOD:
SALE BY TENDER 30/03/2020 @ 7 PM (UNLESS SOLD PRIOR)
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent

Description:
Affordable Style with Central Convenience
Perfectly positioned in a quiet & convenient Hamilton Park cul-de-sac, this Porter Davis home makes an ideal choice for young families & astute investors alike with its free-flowing design, abundance of light & close proximity to everything that counts.
Stylish contemporary living, the home's well-appointed interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & main family bathroom. Adding to its family appeal is a separate lounge & expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a quality kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, plus ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout for all-seasons enjoyment.
Bi-folds (from the living area) reveal a terrific al-fresco entertaining area along with low-maintenance garden surrounds, plus the added advantage of a remote-control double garage. A short stroll to parks & playgrounds, it's also walking distance to Grand Boulevard buses, local shops, childcare centre & popular primary schools, as well as easy access to
Craigieburn's major shopping centres & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Stunning Family Home in Premier location
Proudly positioned in one of the finest pockets of Roxburgh Park, sits this gorgeous family double storey home, on a commanding allotment of approx 626sqm and has been loved and maintained by the one family since new.
Greeted with a beautiful facade and wide entrance with large formal lounge room, leading into the heart of the home, a spacious modern kitchen, overlooking to the meals/family area. Five great sized bedrooms with BIR's, master with walk in robe, BIR's and ensuite. Upstairs kids retreat leading to the balcony, central bathroom with spa bath and downstairs powder room.
Drive through access from the double garage to a huge backyard with paved area suitable to park a boat, trailer or extra cars.
Including: Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, vacuum system, water tank, alarm, light fittings and window furnishings. Conveniently positioned, within walking distance to schools and close to Train station, shopping centre, parks, lakes and playgrounds.
To Inspect The Property please call Romeo Sassine on 0411 882 605.

Description:
Position & Potential On Huge Allotment
Located in one of Craigieburn's most ideal pockets and sitting on a generous parcel of land, the opportunities are endless for the keen investor, builder of first home buyer. Offering three bedrooms, spacious lounge, well equipped kitchen with adjoining meals area and central bathroom. Extras include heating, cooling, solar panels, huge backyard, pergola and more. Also featuring a large double garage/workshop the opportunity to work from home also exits. All in a quiet and peaceful court location, and within a short walk to Craigieburn Station, Primary & Secondary Schools, Local Shops and more.

Family Living At Its Best
THERE WILL BE AN AGENT AVAILABLE BETWEEN 1:30PM AND 2:30PM ON SATURDAY 4TH OF APRIL TO FACILITATE PRIVATE INSPECTIONS ONLY. IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT CALL OR EMAIL US TODAY. PLEASE NOTE: NO APPOINTMENT, NO ENTRY.
Situated in the popular and highly sought-after Aitken Estate, amongst quality homes and treelined streets, this Large family home will need to be inspected to be truly appreciated. Comprising of a large master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms all with built in robes, Well-appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, MASSIVE meals and family room, Formal lounge, large study/optional 5th bedroom just to highlight a few. Additional features include Ducted heating, Split system cooling, Double lock up garage with remote control access, low maintenance front and back gardens and much much more. Mt Aitken Estate's picturesque parks offer peace and quiet, couple with premium elevated streets makes this one of Craigieburn's most desired Locations ..
Close by the Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic and Leisure centre, Craigieburn Junction, Public transport and an abundance of local schools all add value in this tightly held estate. An inspection will not disappoint, Call Now..

Description:
Location, Location, Location
Presented with love & pride, this humble abode offers stress free living with an abundance of character for all home buyers and investors alike. Located in the Heart of Roxburgh Park, this home offers 3 great size bedrooms all with built in robes and the master bedroom featuring walk in robe and ensuite. A large formal lounge that flows effortlessly to a kitchen with ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher with adjoining meals/family area. Other extras include main bathroom with spa, ducted heating & split system cooling, oversized study or 4th bedroom & double remote-control garage with internal access. Entertaining guests will be a breeze with this oversized backyard, perfect for the kids to play until their hearts content. All this and more located within proximity to the Roxburgh Park shopping centre, train station, local schools and more. Don't miss your chance to inspect this hidden gem, it won't hang around for long!

Description:
Quality product for 1st home or Investment !!
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this Brand New Home in prestigious WOODS Estate in Mickleham is a modern contemporary home.
This property offers:
- 3 Bedroom, master with en-suite and walk-in robe, 2 Bedrooms with built-in robe serviced by a central bathroom
- Modern open plan kitchen with pantry
- Open plan living area
- Stone Bench-top
- Front and rear landscaping
- High Ceiling
- 900mm Stainless Steel Cook-top and range-hood
- Dishwasher
- Remote controlled garage & much more!!
- 13 min drive to Melbourne airport
- 29 km to CBD
- Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% -10% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Centered in the heart of the Woods Estate Mickleham. This luxury home is only a minute's drive from amenities such as Mickleham Primary School. This house has been conveniently located to be near the future Mickleham Town Centre as well as new schools, sports facilities, parks, and other recreational facilities.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information

Description:
RELAX, ENTERTAIN & ENJOY
THERE WILL BE AN AGENT AVAILABLE BETWEEN 10:30AM AND 11:30AM ON SATURDAY 4TH OF APRIL TO FACILITATE PRIVATE INSPECTIONS ONLY. IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO BOOK AN APPOINTMENT CALL OR EMAIL US TODAY. PLEASE NOTE: NO APPOINTMENT, NO ENTRY.
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant and charismatic personality, this cleverly designed home delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully-appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe, deluxe ensuite, three additional bedrooms all with build in robes, stunning main bathroom and the perfect formal lounge.
Other luxuries include kitchen with 900ml stainless steel appliances, stone benches, dishwasher & overlooking the dining/living room, ducted heating, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens undercover alfresco area and the picture perfect covered timber decked alfresco area perfect for all family occasions.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!

-4 Bedrooms - Automatic Double Garage

Description:
Doesn't Get Better Than This!
Enjoyed and immaculately maintained by the one family since new, this home provides an environment of immediate comfort and convenience. Spotless interior comprises three generous sized bedrooms (3 with BIR), Master bedroom with Ensuite & WIR, central bathroom, spacious lounge, adjoining dining area, well-appointed kitchen, heating and cooling. Outdoors are quite pleasant with ample play area for the kids, Garage/workshop and a kitchen outside! Moments away from Roxburgh Park Rise primary and the up and coming Roxburgh Park Shopping centre, it's also close to public transport and 7/11 Convenience store. Inspect with confidence!
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 4 bedroom residence combines
an exceptional floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made brand new environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive resort style facade, discover an immaculate & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite with upgraded fixtures & stone bench top, 3 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family striking bathroom. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area with lush garden views from every window served by a well- appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, waterfall stone island bench, soft closing draws, Bosch self-cleaning oven, Bosch cooktop, Rangehood, Dishwasher & butler pantry with under mount sink.
Other stand-out features include Refrigerated zoned cooling & Heating for all seasons comfort, 2700mm high-ceilings, alarm system with Wi-Fi, video intercom. Floating laminate flooring, self-wash close toilets, LED strip lights to kitchen overheads including butler's pantry, floor to ceiling tiles in power room & bathrooms remote garage with internal access, family sized laundry with added storage & stone benches.
Step outside & be greeted by a wonderful backyard garden with fully landscaped gardens and an al-fresco entertaining area with quality. All this in a blue ribbon location, within close proximity to all of Craigieburn amenities, public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be seduced by this quality built Henley home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list.
Flanked by beautifully landscaped gardens, walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk-in robe & ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large-scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, walk-in pantry & ample Ceasar Stone bench space.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides lush emerald green grass which will be the perfect haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Located to perfection, within close proximity to local schools, Highlands Shops, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including ducted heating, zoned refrigeration cooling, double remote garage, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

-High Ceilings,

Description:
A Massive Family Entertainer on 770m2*
Surrounded by other quality homes in a secluded Woodland Park cul-de-sac, this single-level
sensation delivers an aspirational family lifestyle with its outstanding versatility, brilliant entertaining spaces & landscaped garden surrounds.
An oasis of quality and privacy, the home's free-flowing interior showcases 3 main bedrooms
(extra-large master with walk-in robe & ensuite, theatre room (or fourth bedroom) & stylish family bathroom complete with double vanity & floor-to-ceiling tiles.
With an emphasis on entertaining, the home also boasts a versatile rumpus/lounge, vast open-
plan living/dining area & stone-top kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard
space, plus a billiard room, gymnasium or home office (with kitchenette) & stacker doors to an enclosed al-fresco style entertaining area.
Along with ducted heating & evaporative cooling, the home also includes a large laundry &
remote-control double garage with internal entry, wonderfully wide backyard with extensive
paving & manicured hedges for added privacy, plus a landscaped sideway garden complete
with decking, large storage shed, 2000L watertank (to the cisterns) & drip irrigation system
front & rear.
The open spaces of Malcolm Creek parkland & endless walking/cycling trails at the end of the
street, it's also close to local buses & Mount Ridley College, as well as both Highlands &
Craigieburn Central shopping centres.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE LUXURY
Intelligently designed floorplan with dazzling array of premium fittings and fixtures will sway the most discerning buyers. High on impact and built to the highest standard, this home takes low maintenance living to intriguing new heights.
Versatile floor plan allows for dual living areas with intimate lounge or guest room at the front of the home, with stunning designer bathroom adds to the intrigue. The open-plan living/dining areas complemented by stunning kitchen with stainless steel gas cooktop & oven, waterfall stone benches, splash back and pantry makes cooking a breeze.
Offering a massive master bedroom with extensive mirrored sliding robe, supported by a stunning bathroom featuring a bath, separate shower with rainfall shower head and a toilet. The remaining two bedrooms equipped with mirrored sliding robes are complemented by a powder room.
Showcasing trendy exterior & interior this home offers Colorbond roof, façade featuring bluestone tiles, marble tiles, solid timber stairs, engineered floors, remote control garage with internal access, video intercom, alarm , double glazed windows, extensive insulation, split systems throughout for maximum creature comfort.
Positioned perfectly for all families with easy access to park & playground, great fun for all ages, Happy Hippo kindergarten and childcare, public transport, Merrifield farmers market, upcoming shopping centre, proposed facilities (schools, recreation, community facilities). Only minutes from Donnybrook Train Station and easy access to Hume Hwy and proposed future outer metropolitan ring road.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
